name: AmeriProd
tag_list: bunn, kit-cat-clocks, gps-units, car-stereos, inverters, radar-detectors, bunn-coffee-brewers, home-decor, nfl, nhl, mlb, nba, ncaa, pet-supplies, baby, outdoor-living, sports
overview:
AmeriProd is a privately held company operating the E-commerce site ShopAmeriProd.com, supplying consumer goods worldwide.

Their mission is to offer goods to the public with an emphasis on “state-side” manufacturing and offer local manufacturers a platform to showcase their products. They strive to keep their prices as low and competitive as possible to not only grow the brand, but to truly become “America’s online store!”

The company, through its www.shopameriprod.com website, offers consumers information, tools and an interface that makes it easy to find, compare, and buy products and services in various categories. It offers information on various products, including automobile electronics and accessories, baby and kid merchandise, Bunn Commercial beverage systems, home decor, lawn and garden, outdoor living, pet supplies, sports and toys. ShopAmeriProd.com is also known as AmeriProd. The company was reorganized in 2009 and is based in Middleburg, Florida. As of November 1, 2011, shopameriprod.com started operating as a subsidiary of AmeriProd.
